search.custom: * Looks for text containing what you typed. Split with | (this OR that) or & (this AND that). Start with = (exact/equals), != (not equal), !~ (excludes/doesn't contain), or </> (greater than, less than, only numbers).

detail.description: This here'll explain in more detail how user '{0}' left the game.
detail.read_more: Read more 'bout the reasons folks disconnect...

reasons.another: The user went straight to another server without first disconnectin' from this one.
reasons.banned: The user was banned by a staff member for that given reason.
reasons.config: While connectin' the servers, the config couldn't load, so the user got rejected.
reasons.crash: The user's game crashed with that here error message.
reasons.disconnected: The user disconnected from the server by typin' 'disconnect' in the F8 console or somethin' similar.
reasons.doors: The server tried to sync doors with the client but failed, so it kicked the user since it can't recover from this here error.
reasons.editor: The player opened their Rockstar Editor, which automatically leaves the server you're in right now.
reasons.exited: The user exited the game by typin' 'quit' in the F8 console or mashin' ALT and F4 or somethin' similar.
reasons.global: The system detected the user was likely up to somethin' malicious and handed out a global OP-FW ban.
reasons.job: The user's job priority expired. That means the user was in the queue too long for the job priority, so the system kicked 'em outta the queue.
reasons.kicked: The user got kicked by a staff member for the reason given.
reasons.overflow: Safety measure by FiveM to protect y'all from cheaters spammin' yer server with events.
reasons.reloading_game: The user loaded a single-player game by usin' the 'localGame' command in the F8 console or somethin' similar.
reasons.restart: The user got kicked by the server while it was restartin'.
reasons.timeout: The user's connection to the server timed out. This here’s usually the case when the internet connection drops out.
reasons.unknown: No detailed description available. Y'all can ask a developer fer more help.

detail.title: Detailed disconnect reason

logs.diff_label: Time passed since the log entry below.

show.source_helpful_details: Amount of "helpful" actions performed by this staff member in the last 30 days. This means using commands that are generally more used to help OTHER players: /tp_player, /tp_here, /tp_to, /spectate, /staffpm, /wipe, /freeze, /unfreeze, /job, /reset_job, /revive and /revive_range (others only) with commands more commonly used to troll other staff like /slap and /damage excluded.

staff_statistics.description: Some general stats about staff members.
staff_statistics.description_chinese: A detailed record of yer contributions to societal harmony and progress, monitored by the Party for the benefit of all. Remember, every action shows yer dedication to the collective future.
staff_statistics.footer: Yer actions contribute to the success and growth of OP-FW. Through the reliable systems of OP-Framework, yer efforts are recognized and celebrated as part of our collective progress. Teamwork drives achievement, and dedication builds excellence. Glory to the OP-FW!
staff_statistics.footer_chinese: Every action ya take is a testament to yer loyalty and commitment to the Party. Under the watchful eyes of the system, yer contributions are recorded and celebrated as part of our collective progress. Obedience keeps harmony, and vigilance guarantees prosperity. Glory to the CCP!
staff_statistics.level_0_description: Though ya set foot on the staff path, yer potential stays dormant and unshaped. Ya learn from the whispers of mentors and watch the realm's energies swirl around ya with curiosity. The seeds of greatness lie within yer grasp, waitin' for the moment ya step forward to claim 'em.
staff_statistics.level_10_description: Legends tell of yer transcendent ascension, a beacon whose very presence hushes the wildest storms. The brilliance of yer staff’s energy resonates through every corner, forging an unbreakable unity among all under yer watch. At this pinnacle of mortal power, ya shape the realm's destiny with each resolute decree.
staff_statistics.level_1_description: At last, the first sparks o' staff magic shimmer in your hands, guidin' your responses to minor server troubles. You stand ready to calm the occasional squabble or quell fleeting unrest, eager to prove your worth. The arcane bond grows stronger with each call for assistance, ignitin' the promise o' higher mastery.
staff_statistics.level_2_description: Embracin' the subtle currents that shape the server, you deftly juggle reports an' disciplinary steps with emergin' skill. Chaos trembles as your collected demeanor an' swift resolutions keep the peace intact. Each action weaves you deeper into the realm's tapestry, fortifyin' your resolve to safeguard its harmony.
staff_statistics.level_3_description: Your command o' arcane wards an' banishin' incantations anchors the server in a steady calm. Troublemakers find themselves thwarted by your vigilance, an' your glowin' staff stands as a beacon o' authority. Even in the face o' lurkin' shadows, your unwavering dedication transforms turmoil into triumph.
staff_statistics.level_4_description: From the darkest corners, you stand watch, attuned to the faintest flicker o' mischief that threatens the realm. Swift retributions an' precise interventions embody your role as a stalwart guardian, ensurein' no foe lingers long in your domain. The veil between order an' chaos remains safely mended under your vigilant gaze.
staff_statistics.level_5_description: Celestial forces guide your judgments, empowerin' you to keep the peace with cosmic grace. The realm looks to you for balanced decrees, trustin' in your ability to subdue conflict and lift up them in need. With every day, your mastery of astral energies grows, lightin' the way for staff and players alike.
staff_statistics.level_6_description: Your staff resonates with infernal might, banishin' disruptive forces with swift precision. Fear swirls through the unruly at the mere mention of your name, for they know your wrath spares no one who dares upset the realm. But when you're wieldin' that kind of power, you stay mindful of justice, makin' sure it's meted out fair and decisively.
staff_statistics.level_7_description: Radiatin' divine authority, you marshal the realm's defenders and quell unrest before it can take hold. Whispers of your legendary interventions travel far, solidifyin' your status as a guidin' star for all. In your capable hands, the server's fate stays bright, steadfast against the darkness beyond.
staff_statistics.level_8_description: You walk the boundary between light and dark, readin' the hidden threads of chaos before they erupt. Swift freezes and expert kicks prove your devotion to keepin' the peace, leavin' no quarter for lingerin' threats. The synergy of your subtlety and might keeps all who dwell in your domain in harmony.
staff_statistics.level_9_description: Through countless conflicts, y'all's mastery has surpassed mortal limits, blendin' strategic cunning with an unwavering moral compass. Trolls and troublemakers vanish in your wake, each ban or mute an artful stroke of balanced retribution. In this exalted station, your dedication stands as a testament to the realm’s unbreakable resilience.
staff_statistics.title: Staff Statistics

statistics.airlifts_details: Amount of airlifts to the hospital.
statistics.atm_withdraw_fee_details: Combined amount of all ATM withdrawal fees.
statistics.bills_details: Combined amount of all paid bills.
statistics.bus_revenue_details: Combined revenue from all money earned through the bus driver job.
statistics.casino_details: Combined revenue from all them games in the casino.
statistics.crashes_daily_details: Amount o' full game crashes or timeouts on a daily basis.
statistics.crashes_hourly_details: Amount o' full game crashes or timeouts on an hourly basis.
statistics.daily_refresh_details: Combined amount of all paid daily activities refreshes.
statistics.drugs_details: Combined revenue from all drug sales.
statistics.dumpsters_details: Amount of items found in dumpsters.
statistics.economy_stats_details: Compare economy statistics in a graph for the last 30 days.
statistics.edm_details: Combined revenue from all EDM purchases.
statistics.found_items_count_details: Amount o' all items found with a magnifying glass.
statistics.found_items_details: Combined revenue from all items found with a magnifying glass.
statistics.fps_stats_details: Compare FPS statistics in a graph. FPS averages are calculated with at least 10 minutes of data. The minimum and maximum represent the minimum and maximum average FPS a player was experiencin' at that time.
statistics.gem_details: Total take from all gemstone sales.
statistics.impounds_details: Total revenue from vehicles that’ve been impounded.
statistics.joins_details: Number of users that joined the server.
statistics.ls_customs_details: Total revenue from all LS Customs purchases.
statistics.lucky_wheel_details: Number of times the lucky wheel was spun.
statistics.material_vendor_details: Total revenue from all materials sold at the material vendor.
statistics.mining_explosions_details: Number of gems that exploded while being mined.
statistics.money_logs_details: Compare different money logs in a graph for the last 30 days.
statistics.no_economy_recorded: No economy statistics recorded yet. (Recorded once every hour)
statistics.ooc_details: Number of local and global OOC messages sent.
statistics.pawn_details: Total revenue from all Pawn Shop sales.
statistics.paycheck_details: Total amount of all received hourly paychecks.
statistics.pdm_details: Total revenue from all PDM upfront and finance sales.
statistics.player_stats_details: Compare player statistics in a graph.
statistics.robbed_peds_details: All that money stolen by robbin' peds.
statistics.robberies_details: Amount o' store, bank an' jewelry store holdups started.
statistics.shots_fired_details: Amount o' shots fired (that dealt damage) from all weapons that shoot bullets (no melee, etc.).
statistics.special_imports_details: Combined revenue from all special imports sales.
statistics.store_details: Combined revenue from all Store sales (grocery, tool, pd, ems, etc.).
statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.tuner_details: Combined revenue from all Tunershop vehicle sales.
